alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 8:57PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Crawford, northwestern Sebastian, southeastern Sequoyah and northeastern Le Flore Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 857 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Fort Smith, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Barling... Pocola... Muldrow... Roland... Arkoma... Hackett... Bonanza... Moffett... Figure Five... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Kibler... Concord... Shibley... Braden... Mill Creek... Rye Hill... Jenson... Cottonwood... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 10. Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 316 and 328. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
